title: High-Viz Camouflage? Search and State M90 Camo kit blends in & stands out
content:
Camouflage has only one tenet: blend in. That is, unless youâ€™re on a bike. Search and State shatters the rules with its high-visibility cycling camo kit, engineered to simultaneously alert other road users to your presence while simultaneously offering the slick style of camouflage. The M-90 High-Viz S2-R comes in short sleeve and long sleeve
